duties_responsibilities.duty: Exceed district quotas for loan and lease volumes
Meet dealer penetration goals and manage the overall district through analysis of potential opportunities
Develop actionable and measurable territory plans to achieve targeted goals
Directly collaborate with Volvo and Mack Truck representatives to ensure support and strategy alignment
Support OEM's efforts on conquest and targeted customers through team selling and bundling of the truck sale with financial services

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in Finance, Marketing or closely related; master’s degree a plus
